text: Mr. Noodles is a instant noodles company from Canada in the 1970s and produced by a partner company known as Beltek Foods from Huizhou, China. The Mr. Noodles company are sometimes sold in packages as the same size of a traditional ramen bag. Mr. Noodles are sold in instant ramen bags (single, multiple, or a box), instant ramen cups, or instant ramen bowls. It is usually sold in stores and sometimes vending machines. ==Related pages== *Pot Noodle Category:Canadian food companies
title: Mr. Noodles
